attributes.action: Sack public service workers who go on strike
attributes.additional_details:
Millions of people are out of work so if public sector workers go on strike they should be sacked and their jobs given to people who need the work.
To have public sector workers going on strike because they are not happy about the fact that they get better pensions than the rest of the working population and even after changes will still have better pensions is not acceptable to the rest of the working people of this country who are paying taxes to fund the public sector workers pensions.
